page.title: 08Weeley Parish Church
page.content: Reverend John Smith is the rector of St. Edmund's Church, St. Leonard's Church in Beaumont-cum-Moze, and St.Mary's Church in Little Bentley. In the church at Tendring, there is some thirteenth century stained glass which they are very proud of,as it is priceless. The church has a font which was probably built in Henry VIII reign. The church has a peel of six bells, so they have to limit the number of chimes they play. The church was very fortunate to be bought a new set of choir robes by a lady who died. The Schubertians are a choral group who visit every June from the university of California.Carl Zytowski is the leader of the group, and is a tenor.The men are supllied with bed and breakfast by the villagers.
